topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54025f146368727f8e170100#post_54025f146368727f8e170100
[bq="twistedmetalero"]ok so i started watching the touhou anime and so far im not understanding anything[/bq]
The first five minutes are fan wankery to show off "hey all your favorite characters are here"; you can ignore the intro all together.  All you really need to know is the witch and the girl in red go around making sure the town and local area are safe on a regular basis and are a bunch of hotheads that get in fights often with people even when there's no real reason to.
